snippet: The tape of an abusive basketball coach is a timely warning not only to Rutgers but to university presidents everywhere of an out-of-control sports culture.
abstract: Editorial contends belated firing of Rutgers University men's basketball coach Mike Rice underlines larger problems in out-of-control sports culture at many universities across country; calls for full investigation of Rutgers athletic director Tim Pernetti's role in failure to fire Rice.
lead_paragraph: The tape of an abusive basketball coach is a timely warning not only to Rutgers but to university presidents everywhere of an out-of-control sports culture.

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
keywords.name: organizations
